Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
HorrorCharacter
Zombie
public class Zombie extends HorrorCharacter
Represents a Zombie character. A Zombie is a simple HorrorCharacter that cannot transform. It has a shambling, straightforward attack and flee behavior.

  • Nested Class Summary
